Song.title: Only You Satisfy
Song.copyright: Words and music by Zach Jones. © 2006 NAP Record

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [C] So hungry, [F2] so thirsty for [C] That which satisf[F]ies [C] This world’s full of [F] broken cisterns [C] That have left me dr[F]y [Am] There’s [G]only [Dm7]one place [F2]where I’ll [Am7]Find what You [G]made [Gsus]me f[Dm7]or [F2] [Am] There’s [G]only [Dm7]one true [F2]fountain That s[C/E]atisfies my s[F2]oul
Chorus: Only Y[C]ou [Cmaj7] [C]You’re the F[F]ountain of living w[C]ater [Cmaj7] [C]Only [F]You satis[Am]fy [G]my s[C]oul [Cmaj7] [C]You’re the s[F]ource of eternal pl[C/E]easures [Cmaj7] [C]Only Y[F]ou satis[Am]fy [G]my s[Am]oul [G F Am G F]
{new_page} Verse 2: [C] So desperate, [F2] so needy for [C] You to open my e[F2]yes [C] To see where I’ve [F2] turned to idols [C] Where I’ve b[C2]ought their l[F2]ies [Am] There’s [G]only [Dm7]one place [F2]where I’ll [Am7]Find what I'm [G]look[Gsus]ing f[Dm7]or [F2] [Am] There’s [G]only [Dm7]one true [F2]fountain That s[C/E]atisfies my s[F2]oul
Bridge: Whom have I [Bb2] In h[F/A]eaven but You, L[C]ord[C2 C C2] And the e[Bb2]arth Has n[F]o one above You, L[C]ord[C2 C C2] Whom have I [Bb2] In h[F/A]eaven but You, L[C]ord[C2 C C2] And the e[Bb2]arth Has n[F]othing I des[Dm7]ire above You, L[Em]ord [Fmaj7] Above You, L[Em]ord [Fmaj7]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 so hungry so thirsty for that which satisfies this worlds full of broken cisterns that have left me dry theres only one place where ill find what you made me for theres only one true fountain that satisfies my soul chorus only you youre the fountain of living water only you satisfy my soul youre the source of eternal pleasures only you satisfy my soul verse 2 so desperate so needy for you to open my eyes to see where ive turned to idols where ive bought their lies theres only one place where ill find what im looking for theres only one true fountain that satisfies my soul bridge whom have i in heaven but you lord and the earth has no one above you lord whom have i in heaven but you lord and the earth has nothing i desire above you lord above you lord

Arrangement.description: Tag - Jon Bloom's, "Whom Have I in Heaven"
Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [C] So hungry, [F2] so thirsty for [C] That which satisf[F]ies [C] This world’s full of [F] broken cisterns [C] That have left me dr[F]y [Am] There’s [G]only [Dm7]one place [F2]where I’ll [Am7]Find what You [G]made [Gsus]me f[Dm7]or [F2] [Am] There’s [G]only [Dm7]one true [F2]fountain That s[C/E]atisfies my s[F2]oul

Verse 2: [C] So desperate, [F2] so needy for [C] You to open my e[F2]yes [C] To see where I’ve [F2] turned to idols [C] Where I’ve b[C2]ought their l[F2]ies [Am] There’s [G]only [Dm7]one place [F2]where I’ll [Am7]Find what I'm [G]look[Gsus]ing f[Dm7]or [F2] [Am] There’s [G]only [Dm7]one true [F2]fountain That s[C/E]atisfies my s[F2]oul
{new_page} VERSE: [C]Whom have I in [G/B]heaven [E/G#]but [Am]you, O Lo[C/G]rd And [F]earth has nothing [C/E]That I des[Dm11]ire bes[F/G]ides [G]you My [C]flesh and my [G/B]heart [E/G#]may [Am]fail, O Lo[C/G]rd But [F]you are the s[F/G]trength of [G]my h[C]eart [(repeat G/A A)]
CHORUS: [Dm7]And [C/E]my [F9]portion My [Em7]portion [Dm7]You are my [Gsus4]portion [G]for--[Csus-D]ever [Dm7]You’re [C/E]my p[F9]ortion My [Em7]portion [Dm7]You are my [Gsus4]portion [G]for--[C]ever [(to intro)]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 so hungry so thirsty for that which satisfies this worlds full of broken cisterns that have left me dry theres only one place where ill find what you made me for theres only one true fountain that satisfies my soul chorus only you youre the fountain of living water only you satisfy my soul youre the source of eternal pleasures only you satisfy my soul verse 2 so desperate so needy for you to open my eyes to see where ive turned to idols where ive bought their lies theres only one place where ill find what im looking for theres only one true fountain that satisfies my soul verse whom have i in heaven but you o lord and earth has nothing that i desire besides you my flesh and my heart may fail o lord but you are the strength of my heart chorus and my portion my portion you are my portion forever youre my portion my portion you are my portion forever
